title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2998/95 of 20 December 1995 amending Regulations (EEC) No 1912/92, No 1913/92, No 2254/92, No 2255/92, No 2312/92 and No 1148/93 laying down detailed implementing rules for the specific measures for supplying the Canary Islands, the Azores, Madeira and the French overseas departments with beef and veal
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC)  No 2998/95 of 20 December 1995 amending Regulations (EEC) No 1912/92, No 1913/92, No 2254/92, No  2255/92, No 2312/92 and No 1148/93 laying down detailed implementing rules for the specific  measures for supplying the Canary Islands, the Azores, Madeira and the French overseas departments  with beef and veal
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1.  Annexes II and IIa to Regulation (EEC) No 1912/92 are hereby  replaced by Annex I hereto.
3.  Annexes II to Regulations (EEC) No 2254/92, No 2255/92 and No 2312/92 are hereby replaced by  Annex III hereto.
4.  The aid set out in Annex III to Regulation (EEC) No 1912/92 is hereby replaced by the amount  set out in Annex IV hereto.
5.  Annex III to Regulation (EEC) No 1913/92 is hereby replaced by Annex V hereto.
6.  Annex III to Regulation (EEC) No 2312/92 is hereby replaced by Annex VI hereto.
7.  The Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 1148/93 is hereby replaced by Annex VII hereto.
Annex I to Regulation (EEC) No 2312/92 is hereby replaced by Annex VIII hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in  the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 December 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
